localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

previous.excerpt:
Hello investors of reddit.

I know in today’s market we are seeing companies breaking their all time price
records day in and day out, companies being traded at p/e and p/b ratios that
would give Benjamin graham and warren Buffett heart attacks. But I will still
ask our community.

Which companies…
previous.title: Most overvalued companies and why?

localize.title: 最被高估的公司，为什么？
localize.the_new_excerpt:
红豆的投资者们，你们好。

我知道在今天的市场上，我们看到公司打破了他们的历史价格。
日复一日地记录着，公司的交易市盈率和市净率，即
会让本杰明-格雷厄姆和沃伦-巴菲特心脏病发作。但我还是会
问问我们的社区。

哪些公司...

localize.title: 最被高估的公司，爲什麼？
localize.the_new_excerpt:
紅豆的投資者們，你們好。

我知道在今天的市場上，我們看到公司打破了他們的歷史價格。
日復一日地記錄着，公司的交易市盈率和市淨率，即
會讓本傑明-格雷厄姆和沃倫-巴菲特心臟病發作。但我還是會
問問我們的社區。

哪些公司...

next.excerpt:
I am truly curious if any one has good reasons to NOT buy BB at this price IF it
wasn't burdened by its past. The pivot they have made is great imo, and they
have always been top notch cyber security and software company. What would be
your reasons to not buy BB if they were a fresh company from…
next.title: I want to hear a Bear case for BB, without bringing up the past - as if they are a fresh company

localize.title: 我想听一听BB的熊案，不提过去的事--好像他们是一家新鲜的公司。
